intent_atoms.description: Provide a regression test suite for tolerant traversal that verifies continued parsing after corruption and accurate issue recording.
All 11 test methods must pass without failures when run against the tolerant parser implementation.
Each tolerant mode test must assert that traversal continues beyond a corrupt node and records a ParseIssue with correct reason code and byte range.
Zero-length loop guard tests must prevent infinite iteration and record guard.zero_size_loop issue.
Deep recursion guard tests must enforce a depth limit of 64 and record guard.recursion_depth_exceeded issue.
Invalid four-character code test must record an unknown box issue (VR-006) instead of header.invalid_fourcc.
Truncated size field test must record a reader_error issue.
Child exceeding parent range test must record payload.truncated for child exceeding parent bounds.
Metrics aggregation tests must verify error/warning/info counts match actual issues and use ParseIssueStore.makeIssueSummary().
